column1: Fraction of Lowered Virulence for Double Resistant Subpopulations

Equations for Mono Resistant Bacteria Dynamics

\(\frac{d}{dt}R_{2} = \lambda_{0} \cdot R_{2} \cdot (1 - (B_{tot}/(frac_{2}\cdot B_{max}))^{\lambda_{1}}) - (k_{1}\cdot P_{1} + k_{3}\cdot P_{3})\cdot R_{2}\)
